articles.description: Travis Scott performs live to over 12m people in record-breaking Fortnite concert
articles.content:
Popular musician Travis Scott has found a new way to keep his followers entertained - performing live to over 12 million people on the video game Fortnite.
The music industry is one of a number of sectors suffering as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
L… [+1570 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Andrews
articles.title: Coronavirus in Scotland: Festival takes a pop at Sturgeon - The Times
articles.description: Scotland’s Trnsmt music festival has been branded irresponsible after appearing to blame Nicola Sturgeon for its cancellation.The event at Glasgow Green was due to take place from July 10-12
articles.content:
Scotlands Trnsmt music festival has been branded irresponsible after appearing to blame Nicola Sturgeon for its cancellation.
The event at Glasgow Green was due to take place from July 10-12, headlined by Lewis Capaldi and Liam Gallagher.

articles.title: How the Queen comes into her own during a crisis - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Why do we turn to the Queen during crises – and how does she know instinctively what to say? In the week she turns 94, Harry Mount reports
articles.content: After thanking NHS workers, she turned to the majority of us, trapped at home, and subtly backed the Governments message that we should stay there. By thanking us for staying at home unlike the Governments irritating Americanism, asking us to stay home she ev… [+2382 chars]
